mapper.insert:
select items_seq.nextval from dual
insert into items (items_no, items_name, items_company, items_price,items_context, items_color, items_detail, items_model, items_manufacture, items_origin, items_mainphoto) values (items_seq.nextval, #{items_name}, #{items_company), #{items_price}, #{items_context}, #{items_color}, #{items_detail}, #{items_model}, #{items_manufacture}, #{items_origin}, #{items_mainphoto})
